name: Aina (brianheagney)
description:
Aina is a digital psychological card sorting application based on the Wisconsin Card Sorting Task.

Students at High Point University work with Professor Brian Heagney and Dr. Joanne Altman to design and develop the mobile application.

Credits

Brian Heagney: Producer
Ben Rolison: Programming
Michael Smith: Programming
Kira Foglesong: Art, Design
